title: Revel in the Beauty of Monsoon at Deltin Suites & Deltin Royale, Goa - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Revel in the Beauty of Monsoon at Deltin Suites & Deltin Royale, Goa Published on : Wednesday, July 8, 2015
Monsoon has arrived after the sweltering summer heat. Immerse yourself in the beauty that nature has to offer lavishly at Deltin Suites; the luxury 5-star hotel in the heart of Goa, offering attractive packages for the monsoon.
Spoil yourself for choices as Deltin Suites offers two nights- three days executive suite stay with entry to Deltin Royale on any one night at packages starting from Rs. 13999/- only. The 86-suite hotel offers free transfers to casinos, 24×7 room service, outdoor, Banquets, swimming pool, gym, and spa facilities to pamper you through your visit.
Goa isn’t just about its beaches, shacks and parties by the sea but is also a destination for gamers. Deltin Royale, the sparkling casino is truly the jewel in the midst of serene Mandovi River and a place where you experience gaming at its best! While you are enjoying the luxury at Deltin Suites, the nightlife at Deltin Royale, India’s most opulent offshore casino throbs on while others put down the lid. You could also dance the night away to the tunes of one of Goa’s lead bands in Vegas restaurant or simply unwind at Whiskys lounge with the unlimited offerings.
At Deltin Suites, indulge your taste buds at the multi-cuisine restaurant Vegas or their newly launched Pan-Asian restaurant – Emperor and premium Whiskys lounge bar with its extraordinary selection of single malts, and you have an experience that is impossible to beat at Deltin Suites. This luxury hotel is close to everything and yet offers a respite from the hullaballoo of Goa’s more crowded locations.
Enjoy the extraordinary service, remarkable food and excellent vista at a top notch destination for Monsoon with Deltin Suites & Deltin Royale.
The package offers:
· 2 Nights/ 3days – Stay & Play Package for 2 only for Rs 13,999/-
§ Welcome drink on Arrival
§ One night of Unlimited dinner and house brand drinks for 2 people on board Deltin Royale
§ Rs. 1500/- worth One Time Playing Chips ( OTPC)
§ This package is valid till 30th September 2015 and is inclusive of breakfast. Package will not be applicable during the blackout date and subject to availability.
2 Nights / 3 Days – Premium Stay and Play Package for 2 only for Rs 33,000/-
§ Welcome drink on arrival
§ Rs. 30,000 worth One Time Play Chips (OTPC) per room
§ Two night of Unlimited dinner and house brand drinks for 2 people on board Deltin Royale
§ This package is valid till 30th September 2015. Package will not be applicable during the blackout date and subject to availability.
